mapper.select: select CATEGORY_NO no, CATEGORY_TITLE title, CATEGORY_SHOWTYPE showType, CATEGORY_ORDERS orders, CATEGORY_VISIBILITY visibility, SUBCATEGORY_NO subCategoryNo from blog_category where subcategory_no = #{value}

select a.CATEGORY_NO no, a.category_title title, a.CATEGORY_SHOWTYPE showType, a.CATEGORY_ORDERS orders, a.CATEGORY_VISIBILITY visibility, a.SUBCATEGORY_NO subCategoryNo from( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY subcategory_no ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDERS asc) row_no, CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_TITLE , CATEGORY_SHOWTYPE, CATEGORY_ORDERS, CATEGORY_VISIBILITY, SUBCATEGORY_NO from blog_category ) a, blog_subcategory b, blog c where row_no = 1 and a.subcategory_no = b.subcategory_no and b.blog_no = c.blog_no and c.blog_no = #{value}

select CATEGORY_NO no, CATEGORY_TITLE title, CATEGORY_SHOWTYPE showType, CATEGORY_ORDERS orders, CATEGORY_VISIBILITY visibility, SUBCATEGORY_NO subCategoryNo from blog_category where category_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into blog_category( CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_TITLE, CATEGORY_SHOWTYPE, CATEGORY_ORDERS, CATEGORY_VISIBILITY, SUBCATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_CREATEDATE ) values( blog_seq.nextval,#{title},'onerow',1,'As',#{subCategoryNo},sysdate )
mapper.update: update blog_category set CATEGORY_TITLE = #{title}, CATEGORY_SHOWTYPE = #{showType}, CATEGORY_ORDERS = #{orders}, CATEGORY_VISIBILITY = #{visibility}, SUBCATEGORY_NO = #{subCategoryNo} where CATEGORY_NO = #{no}
